creator: bayard@apache.org
text:
There is a test package within the source tree that should be rewritten as JUnit
tests and moved into the tests tree.

creator: bayard@apache.org
text:
svn ci -m "Moving the JSTL main() 'tests' from the src tree to the test tree as
per #43640" src test

Deleting       src/org/apache/taglibs/standard/lang/jstl/test
Adding         test/org/apache/taglibs/standard/lang/jstl/test

Committed revision 607685.

creator: bayard@apache.org
text:

creator: bayard@apache.org
bayard@apache.org
text: Need to get the EvaluationTest passing before closing this.

creator: bayard@apache.org
text: ParserTest failing since the move to JSTL 1.2.

creator: jboynes@apache.org
text: Fixed ParserTest by setting javax.servlet.jsp.functions.allowed property true (as per previous command line invocation)

creator: jboynes@apache.org
text: EvaluationTest failed on JDK1.5 because Boolean was changed to implement Comparable which changes the behaviour per section 1.8.1 of the EL specification

creator: jboynes@apache.org
text: Resolving as all tests now pass and none need to be excluded.
